comment.body: uh
interesting, reading...
on location-addressing, he's correct. ipns is rather slow and needs improvement
but the problem can be solved in zeronet's way, lol
pubsub is also ok
though there're tasks undone, but ipfs is potential, content-addressing is not wrong. i think the author is somewhat jealous. umm, yeah, crypto coins project is profitable.
dht is currently the best choice. the problem is ipfs is not user-friendly, so the author just says it sucks
@Aassddff: I can conclude that you know nothing on ipfs
@Styromaniac: Yeah, IPZN is a GUI like ZeroNet, in some ways
@Aassddff: You said IPFS is better for big files, but actually, regarding small files, ipfs is also better because it stores files by database, leveldb, which significantly improves the performance
@Aassddff: IPFS just lacks higher-layer and user-friendliness which will be solved by my project, IPZN. However IPFS has a perfect design of lower-layer
lol, right, ipfs lacks dynamic content support, which is probably they're working on, but it seems ipns still sucks
vaporware? i think zeronet devs should drop zeronet and start working on ipfs
IPFS is awesome, at least for its design. Dat didn't work for me at all
@Ansho Rei: No, it is a competitor
Religion ? You need to know we believe in atheism. Fuck theism
@Geekless: maybe, but trackers
@Aassddff: among ?
@Aassddff: I mean typo ðŸ˜€
